title: Input format for the 'change control parameters command' conversion tool
description: The JSON generated from this schema can be deciphered by GSE or SILS through a conversion tool.

converter.title: Converter type
converter.description: Please select the converter you wish to use for command conversion.

commands.title: Commands
commands.description: Please add the contents of the command you wish to generate.

time.title: Command execution time
time.description: Specify the command execution time in seconds.

type.title: Command type
type.description: Command type is a fixed string.

elements.title: Command Elements
elements.description: Command Elements of the ControlParameterChange command.

data.title: Argument data
data.description: Data structure corresponding to the arguments of the command..

orbit.title: Satellite orbital motion elements
orbit.description: Change parameters related to the orbital motion of the satellite and the Earth's rotation and orbital motion.  If you want to change this, change orbit_element to true.

epoch.title: Reference epoch for orbital elements
epoch.description: Time evolution is performed based on this UNIX epoch time (s).

obliquity.title: Obliquity of the ecliptic
obliquity.description: This angle (deg) is the angle between the earth's equator and the ecliptic, which varies slightly with the precession of the ecliptic.

ecliptic_longitude.title: Ecliptic longitude
ecliptic_longitude.description: This angle (deg) is the angle between the vernal equinox and the sun along the ecliptic, and represents the earth's orbital motion.

earth_rotation.title: Earth rotation angle
earth_rotation.description: This angle (deg) is the angle between the vernal equinox along the equatorial plane of the earth and the earth's prime meridian, and represents the earth's rotational motion.

sat_orbital_period.title: Satellite orbital period
sat_orbital_period.description: Satellite orbital period (s) in Earth's circular orbit.

sat_ascending_node.title: Satellite right ascension of the ascending node
sat_ascending_node.description: This angle (deg) is the angle between the vernal equinox and the ascending intersection along the equatorial plane of the earth.

sat_latitude_argument.title: Satellite argument of latitude
sat_latitude_argument.description: This angle (deg) is an angular parameter that defines the position of a body moving along a Kepler orbit.

sat_inclination.title: The sat_inclination Schema
sat_inclination.description: This angle (deg) is the angle between the earth's equator and the satellite orbital plane.

rw_controller.title: RW Controller parameters
rw_controller.description: Change parameters related to RW controllers.

d.title: RW-D Controller
d.description: RW-D Controller parameters. If you want to change this, change rw_d to true.

pd.title: RW-PD Controller
pd.description: RW-PD Controller parameters. If you want to change this, change rw_pd to true.

sun_pd.title: RW-sPD Controller
sun_pd.description: RW-sPD Controller parameters. If you want to change this, change rw_sun_pd to true.

sun_acq_pd.title: RW-Acq-sPD Controller
sun_acq_pd.description: RW-Acq-sPD Controller parameters. If you want to change this, change rw_acq_sun_pd to true.

pid.title: RW-PID Controller
pid.description: RW-Acq-sPD Controller parameters. If you want to change this, change rw_pid to true.

max_torque.title: Maximum output torque of RW
max_torque.description: Output torque (Nm) saturation threshold. Torque command values above this value are subject to saturation processing. If you want to change this, change rw_max_torque to true.

operation_point.title: RW operating point
operation_point.description: RW rotates at this value (deg/s) on average. If you want to change this, change rw_max_torque to true.

mtq_controller.title: MTQ Controller parameters
mtq_controller.description: Change parameters related to MTQ controllers.

b_dot.title: MTQ-Bdot Controller
b_dot.description: MTQ-Bdot Controller parameters. If you want to change this, change mtq_b_dot to true.

hbb.title: MTQ-hBb Controller
hbb.description: MTQ-hBb Controller parameters. If you want to change this, change mtq_hbb to true.

d.title: MTQ-D Controller
d.description: MTQ-D Controller parameters. If you want to change this, change mtq_d to true.

pd.title: MTQ-PD Controller
pd.description: MTQ-PD Controller parameters. If you want to change this, change mtq_pd to true.

sun_pd.title: MTQ-sPD Controller
sun_pd.description: MTQ-sPD Controller parameters. If you want to change this, change mtq_sun_pd to true.

max_mag_moment.title: Maximum output torque of RW
max_mag_moment.description: Output magnetic moment (Am^2) saturation threshold. magnetic moment command values above this value are subject to saturation processing. If you want to change this, change mtq_max_mag_moment to true.

foam_estimator.title: FOAM weight parameters
foam_estimator.description: Change weighting parameters for attitude estimation. If you want to change this, change foam_weight to true.

sun_vector_weight.title: FSS weight
sun_vector_weight.description: Weights of FSS sun direction vector measurements.

mag_vector_weight.title: GAS weight
mag_vector_weight.description: Weights of GAS earth's magnetic field vector measurements.

mkf_estimator.title: MKF weight parameters
mkf_estimator.description: Change weighting parameters for attitude and angular velocity bias estimation. If you want to change this, change mkf_weight to true.

bias_state_weight.title: Angular velocity bias weight
bias_state_weight.description: State weights of angular velocity bias estimation.

stt_observation_weight.title: STT weight
stt_observation_weight.description: Observation weights of STT attitude quaternion measurements.

fss_observation_weight.title: FSS weight
fss_observation_weight.description: Observation weights of FSS sun direction vector measurements.

gas_observation_weight.title: GAS weight
gas_observation_weight.description: Observation weights of GAS earth's magnetic field vector.

supervisor.title: Controller supervisor parameters
supervisor.description: Change parameters related to controller supervisor.

operation_mode.title: Current operation mode
operation_mode.description: Current operating mode of the controller supervisor. If you want to change this, change supervisor_status to true.

pre_operation_mode.title: Previous operation mode
pre_operation_mode.description: Previous operating mode of the controller supervisor. If you want to change this, change supervisor_status to true.

scenario.title: Current scenario
scenario.description: Current scenario of the controller supervisor. If you want to change this, change supervisor_status to true.

pre_scenario.title: Previous scenario
pre_scenario.description: Previous scenario of the controller supervisor. If you want to change this, change supervisor_status to true.

normal_limit_time.title: Scenario waiting time threshold
normal_limit_time.description: Waiting time threshold (s) for state transitions in normal operation. If you want to change this, change supervisor_normal_limit_time to true.

day_night_bright_from_day_spd.title: RW-sPD control when entering day night bright from day side

day_night_bright_from_dark_spd.title: RW-sPD control when entering day night bright from dark

night_day_bright_from_night_pd.title: RW-PD control when entering night day bright from night side

night_from_dark_spd.title: RW-sPD control when entering night side from dark

sun_search_rotation.title: Axis switching of sun search rotation

gps_d2n_threshold.title: GPS day to night threshold angle
gps_d2n_threshold.description: I don't know the details. If you want to change this, change gps_d2n_threshold to true.

gps_n2d_threshold.title: GPS night to day threshold angle
gps_n2d_threshold.description: I don't know the details. If you want to change this, change gps_n2d_threshold to true.

unstable_rotation_threshold.title: Unstable rotation detection
unstable_rotation_threshold.description: Angular velocity lower limit threshold (deg/s) for unstable rotation detection. If you want to change this, change unstable_rotation_threshold to true.

attitude_lost_threshold.title: Attitude lost detection
attitude_lost_threshold.description: Angular velocity lower limit threshold (deg/s) for attitude lost detection. If you want to change this, attitude_lost_threshold to true.

detumbling_threshold.title: End of detumbling detection
detumbling_threshold.description: Angular velocity (deg/s) upper limit threshold for End of detumbling detection. If you want to change this, change detumbling_threshold to true.

sun_acq_time_threshold.title: Sun acquisition continuous time
sun_acq_time_threshold.description: If the sun capture condition can be maintained during this time (s), the scenario is transitioned. If you want to change this, change sun_acq_time_threshold to true.

sun_acq_angle_threshold.title: Sun acquisition detection angle
sun_acq_angle_threshold.description: Sun elongation (deg) threshold for sun acquisition detection. If you want to change this, change sun_acq_angle_threshold to true.

sun_detect_threshold.title: Sun detection light intensity threshold
sun_detect_threshold.description: Solar detection light intensity threshold (V) of CSS. If you want to change this, change sun_detect_threshold to true.

one_axis_rotation.title: One axis rotation process parameter
one_axis_rotation.description: Change parameters related to one axis rotation process. If you want to change this, change one_axis_rotation to true.

start_attitude.title: Rotation start attitude
start_attitude.description: Attitude when starting one axis rotation process

end_attitude.title: Rotation end attitude
end_attitude.description: Attitude quaternion [x, y, z, w] when end one axis rotation process

step_number.title: Step number
step_number.description: How many divisions of rotation to control interpolation.

apply_bit.title: Command parameter change apply bit
apply_bit.description: Changing the bit corresponding to each command argument pair to true applies the rewriting.

mtq_max_mag_moment.title: Change MTQ maximum output magnetic moment

gps_d2n_threshold.title: Change GPS day to night threshold

gps_n2d_threshold.title: Change GPS night to day threshold

detumbling_threshold.title: Change end of detumbling detection threshold

sun_acq_time_threshold.title: Change continuous sun acquisition detection threshold
